meanings.sent1: She enjoys inwrapping gifts during the holidays.
meanings.sent2: Please be careful when inwrapping fragile items.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried inwrapping itself in a blanket, thinking it was a game.
meanings.sent4: The fog inwrapped the city, creating a mysterious atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The magician's hands moved swiftly, inwrapping the silk scarf with precision.

meanings.definition: The act of wrapping or enclosing something.
meanings.sent1: The inwrapping of the present was done beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I love the sound of inwrapping paper being torn open.
meanings.sent3: The inwrapping of the candy bar revealed a golden ticket inside.
meanings.sent4: The inwrapping of the cocoon revealed a beautiful butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The inwrapping of the bandage revealed the healed wound underneath.
